desc: We are a New Zealand based business that provide a wide range of concrete anchors to give our re-sellers access to the latest in quality anchoring solutions. Our connection with world leading Anchoring brands allows us to ensure that our customers have access to over 40 years of experience and innovation.

layout.text: ICCONS Thunderbolt Pro-XTM Hex Head is the latest approved high tensile screw-in, self-tapping concrete and masonry anchor for use in a wide range of materials used in the construction Industry.
